price: Rabbinizden yardım/medet dilemiştiniz de size: Birbiri ardınca bin melek ile size yardım edeceğim, diye cevap vermişti.
arabic: إِذۡ تَسۡتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَكُمۡ أَنِّي مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلۡفٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ مُرۡدِفِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idh tastaghīthūna rabbakum fa-is'tajāba lakum annī mumiddukum bi-alfin mina al-malāikati mur'difīna
